Status Check:

Link pannuvadhu:

Method 1 - Online:
1. eportal.incometax.gov.in â†’ 'Link Aadhaar'
2. Enter PAN + Aadhaar + Name + Mobile
3. OTP validate
4. Pay â‚¹1,000 (late fee)
5. Done!

Method 2 - SMS:
- Send: UIDPAN <12-digit Aadhaar> <10-digit PAN>
- To: 567678 or 56161
- Example: UIDPAN 123456789012 ABCDE1234F

Tamil Nadu State Legal Services Authority (TNSLSA). Eligibility: BPL family, SC/ST, Women, Differently abled. Phone: 15100 (toll-free). Every district court-la Legal Aid Cell irukku. Lok Adalat: Cases-a easily solve pannalam.

â‚¹1,000/month for woman head of family in TN. Eligibility: 21+ age, family income below â‚¹2.5 lakh, not govt employee/tax payer, no other pension. Apply through Anganwadi or kalaaboravu.tn.gov.in with Aadhaar, ration card, bank account.

Visit nearest Aadhaar Enrollment Center (find at uidai.gov.in), carry identity proof (Voter ID/PAN/Passport), address proof (Ration Card/EB Bill), and age proof (Birth Certificate/SSLC). Biometric capture will be done. First enrollment is FREE. Aadhaar delivered within 90 days.
